text: The 1930-31 Austrian Cup was the cup competition in Austrian football. The competition was held in championship mode for Clubs from the first league. It is natural that this new competition met with resistance from the second-rate and amateur clubs, who were prevented from matches with clubs from the highest league. An announced replacement competition for these clubs did not take place.Austrian soccer == Round 1 == The game was canceled because the Wackerplatz was unusable and never played again. In July 1931it was verified with 0:0 and 0 points for both teams. The game was stopped in the 65th minute due to storm. Replay match from 23 November which was stopped due to storm. ==Round 2== ==Round 3== ==Round 4== ==Round 5== ==Round 6== ==Round 7== ==Round 8== This match was the decisive game for the overall victory. There was a long argument about the verification of the result due to a mistake by the referee in the winning goal for the WAC (first offside, but goal after a protest). The final desicion to verifie the result was on 4 June 1931. ==Round 9== ===Final table=== Rank Team W D L P 1 Wiener AC 7 2 0 16 2 FK Austria Wien 7 1 1 15 3 Admira Wien 6 0 3 12 4 First Vienna FC 4 2 3 10 5 Wiener Sport-Club 4 1 4 9 6 SK Slovan Wien 3 2 4 8 7 SK Rapid Wien 3 1 5 7 8 SC Wacker Wien 2 1 6 5 9 Floridsdorfer AC 1 2 6 4 10 SC Nicholson 1 0 8 2 Austrian Soccer ==References== Category:Austrian Cup Category:1931 in sports Category:1930s in Austria Category:1931 in Europe Category:1930 in Europe
